response.overview: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school — the end of her thus far disastrous eighth grade year — before she begins high school.
response.tagline: Based on the most awkward year of your life
response.title: Eighth Grade
